ygData.subject: Re: Orb of Teeshan ?
ygData.msgSnippet: that glowing orb is most likely a Blackened Sapphire.   It gives a STA bonus and provides light.  Maybe some other bonuses too, i dont remember right now. Snos
ygData.messageBody:
that glowing orb is most likely a Blackened Sapphire. It gives a STA
bonus and provides light. Maybe some other bonuses too, i dont remember
right now.

Snos



Reuben Aguilar wrote:
>
> From: "Reuben Aguilar" <reuben@...>
>
> I am interested in finding the Orb or Teeshan. I have been told its on
> Nafagen's corpse. Being that I am bearly reaching 20 , I won't be able to
> accomplish this any time soon. I just want to know out of curiosity if this
> is true.
>
> Also, Where does one get the Shimmering orb ? I bought one from a auction
> and am curious as to the origination of this item ?
>
> Oh yeah.. I saw this gnome with with a glowing orb of sorts on his
> character.. He wouldn't let me look at it nor would he tell me its name.
> Upon the 2 second glance in his inventorey look, it was a blue stone.. kina
> like a jewel.. Anyone know what it is ?
>
